summary: An Italian doctor starts a new life in Kenya to escape the city, but life catches up with him when an old friend offers his assistance along with his wife, who happens to be an old lover. (Italian with English subtitles).
cast: Pierfrancesco Favino|Stefano Accorsi|Vittoria Puccini|Camilla Filippi|Angelo Orlando|Pietro Ragusa|Djibril Kébé|Souleymane Sow|Eliana Miglio|Ivano Marescotti|Max Tardioli
title: La vida fácil
